data.message: Back in the day, he bashed Busch and now he bashes Trump. Ever wonder why he never bashed Obama? I'll tell you why. If he bashed Obama, he would've been called racist and the media and everyone else would have ruined his career.

replies.message: As an American, you should never trash talk the president.
So why was it OK when Obama was trash talked?

Joshua Cummins It wasn't ok to bash Obama. If you read my reply you would have seen that I said it's not ok to bash any president. Eminem has always had rebellious lyrics bashing the president, but he never said anything bad about Obama. You know he had something to say but held back. Any American that bashes the president (white or black) loses my respect, but after all, he's just doing it to sell music and concert tickets. Controversy has always been his angle.

Or, 
it's because he sided with Obama and doesn't side with Trump. 
Maybe that's all it is.
Chandler Johnson so you like to defend Eminem who spent most of his career spitting vile anti gay rhetoric. Nice lol
Christina Sierra  How do you interpret Chandler's comment as defending Eminem?
Chandler Johnson Funny since Obama is a closet homosexual, and Eminem gay bashed.  Maybe em doth protest too much?
I wasn't defending Eminem. That's literally how politics work.
Heather, it's your bed time. ✌️
Chandler Johnson  nah I got three more hours at the most.
That's late. Good luck! ✌️
Cause he's a weak, ignorant, bitch
Bush***. And he never bashed Obama because Obama was the only one who actually cared and did their fucking job and a damn good job of it lol.

Exactly. It is all about career moves. At this point Hollywood elites are being back doored by the illuminati. They are being controlled. Kanye West tried to tell everyone. But most are too stupid to pay attention. The illuminati rely on the masses to be unintelligent
Eminem voted for Obama, he likes him. Maybe thats why. lol dumbass.
Rebecca Reed
Couldn't have said it better myself
No its because Obama was a good president
Maybe just maybe because Eminem is human and is ALLOWED to have opinions and also he liked Obama . itsnotalwaysaboutcareer
He's not edgy then he's just a 44 year old has been
Well, I didn't like Bush either. And I voted for Obama. And I despise trump. I'm not a racist at all. Trump is a horrible human being.
